project.Title: Gyll's Vanilla: Heroes
project.ItemDescription:
[b]Gyll’s Vanilla: Heroes[/b] redesigns or rebalances all 15 original hero classes. [i]Flagellant & Shieldbreaker redesigns are in the works and will be released as separate mods when ready.[/i]
[h1][b]Design Goals[/b][/h1] - Increase the number of viable skill builds for each class - Ensure that no class is consistently outshined by any other - Deliver mechanically on the promise of the original art & character designs - In general, simplify skills & tooltips - Ensure that remaining effects are impactful, both in terms of feel and in how they affect your decisions
[h1][b]About Gyll’s Vanilla[/b][/h1] [b]Gyll’s Vanilla[/b] is a collection of mods for Darkest Dungeon, each of which redesigns a single aspect of the game. These mods are balanced against the vanilla base game and designed for maximum compatibility, creating a solid foundation for your modded campaigns. [i]Heroes is currently the only mod in the series, Quirks and Monsters are planned as the next two.[/i]
